string.name: validation_error_username
string.value: Username must be at least 4 characters long

string.name: validation_error_fullname
string.value: Fullname must have at least %d characters

string.name: validation_error_password
string.value: Password must be at least 8 characters long

string.name: validation_error_min_length
string.value: Field must be at least %d characters long

string.name: validation_error_max_length
string.value: Field must be at most %d characters long

string.name: validation_error_range_length
string.value: Field must be between %1$d and %2$d characters long

string.name: validation_error_exact_length
string.value: Field must be exactly %d characters long

string.name: validation_error_older_than_years
string.value: Must be at least %d years long
